name: places/ChIJezjaTQnzwokR--L8FFdGlEU

displayName.text: Prohealth and Fitness PT OT PLLC

formattedAddress: 4915 Broadway Suite 1J, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 4915 Broadway Suite 1J, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: Everyone in this office is absolutely amazing! From Pedro and Addy at the front desk providing exceptional customer service, making it incredibly easy to schedule/reschedule appointments and calling patients to remind them of their appointment date and time, to the extraordinary therapists Maidy, Colin, and Vivianna! I felt, and was treated, like a priority when I walked into this office and I think that it is wonderful that they treat every patient with the same level of time, care, and respect! The services provided to me really eased my post-surgery ankle recovery and, in no time, I was back to running! Thank you Maidy, Colin, Vivianna, Pedro, and Addy for the excellent services and treatment provided. If I ever need physical therapy again, I know exactly where to go!

originalText.text: This office is top of the line. From Colin being the best PT of all time, to Pedro and Addie being the best front desk personnel I’ve ever dealt with. My body is genuinely so much better than my start date. Please do yourself a favor and if you are in need of PT, this is the place to go. Vivi and Maidy are amazing as well!!!! Thank you Prohealth!!

text.text: This office is top of the line. From Colin being the best PT of all time, to Pedro and Addie being the best front desk personnel I’ve ever dealt with. My body is genuinely so much better than my start date. Please do yourself a favor and if you are in need of PT, this is the place to go. Vivi and Maidy are amazing as well!!!! Thank you Prohealth!!

originalText.text: I can’t praise this place highly enough! A couple months ago I was in a wheelchair and my podiatrist was saying I needed to get my feet reconstructed. I decided to try PT first (thankfully), and Colin quickly realized I had a back injury that was manifesting in my feet. Now a few weeks of PT later, I just spent the morning running around barefoot with my kids at the splash pad!

originalText.text: I love ❤️ the staff at Prohealth and Fitness. They are very caring, patient and supportive. I feel safe when I’m there. I truly appreciate everyone that works there.
